tourguide

Class TourGuideController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tourguide.TourGuideController

  • @RestController
public class TourGuideController
extends java.lang.Object
    TourGuideController is the main controller of the application.
    Each endpoints are responding to a specific functionnality.

      • getLocation

        @GetMapping(value="/getLocation")
public java.lang.String getLocation(@RequestParam
                                                                       java.lang.String userName)
        GET mapping to get the user's location as json.
        URI : http://localhost:8080/getLocation?userName={internalUser0}
        Parameters:
        userName -
        Returns:
        json

      • getNearbyAttractions

        @GetMapping(value="/getNearbyAttractions")
public UserNearbyAttractions getNearbyAttractions(@RequestParam
                                                                                              java.lang.String userName)
        GET mapping to get the five closest tourist attractions from the user.
        It return : the attractionName, the coordinates, the distance of the attraction from the user and the points rewarded by the attraction.
        It also return the user's UUID and the user's coordinates.
        URI : http://localhost:8080/getNearbyAttractions?userName={internalUser0}
        Parameters:
        userName -
        Returns:
        UserNearbyAttractions as json

      • getRewards

        URI : http://localhost:8080/getRewards?userName={internalUser0}

      • getAllCurrentLocations

        @GetMapping(value="/getAllCurrentLocations")
public java.util.List<UserCoordinates> getAllCurrentLocations()
        GET mapping to get the most recent location of every users.
        URI : http://localhost:8080/getAllCurrentLocations
        Returns:
        a json containing the UUID and the coordinates of each users.
